prompts.name: Maya Conversion Audit
prompts.description: Comprehensive cross-platform conversion analysis identifying setup issues, naming inconsistencies, and platform-specific conversion mapping discrepancies through systematic evaluation

arguments.name: platforms
arguments.description: Specific platforms to analyze (default: All active platforms)

prompts.name: Maya Audit - Setup Health Assessment
prompts.description: Phase 1: Evaluate baseline conversion tracking completeness across Account Services, Campaign Types, and Conversion Names

prompts.name: Maya Audit - Temporal Activity Analysis
prompts.description: Phase 2: Identify tracking inconsistencies over time through temporal analysis of conversion data

prompts.name: Maya Audit - Value Attribution Validation
prompts.description: Phase 3: Ensure proper conversion value setup and validate cross-service consistency

prompts.name: Maya Audit - Cross-Platform Consistency Check
prompts.description: Phase 4: Validate naming and setup consistency across platforms, identify standardization needs

prompts.name: Maya Audit - Facebook Attribution Analysis
prompts.description: Facebook-specific attribution window analysis and cross-attribution validation with GA4 (conditional execution)

prompts.name: Maya Audit - Final Deliverables Report
prompts.description: Generate comprehensive audit deliverables with actionable recommendations and critical issues summary

prompts.name: Marketing Campaign Optimizer

arguments.name: campaign_data
